title: How to solve “Too many Open Files” in Java applications
content: Scenario: Your application log displays the error message “Too many Open Files“. As a result, application requests are failing and you need to restart the application. In some cases, you also need to reboot your machine. Facts: The JVM console (or log file) contains the following error: java.io.FileNotFoundException: filename (Too many open files) at java.io.FileInputStream.open(Native ...
